Amazing pizza!  Stopped in here for a couple medium sized slices which came out around 8 Euro.  The jamon y queso had little chunks of pork coated in some kind of tangy vinegar pepper sauce.  The other slice was something like buffalo mozzarella (super soft and fresh) with jamon and arugula.  It was damn good.  Pizza on foccaccia style bread is not something I'm used to (in the Boston area) but no complaints whatsoever.  One of the best and cheapest meals we've had in Barcelona so far.  I want to go back and try the slices which were LOADED up with jamon y brie.
